title: Variation in water utilization by mammal diversity in Khao Phaeng Ma Non-hunting area, Thailand

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Rattanawat Chaiyarat, Piyamaporn Thongkrathok, Wanwipa Maisuwan, Amornrat Chantra, Jinda Chimplee, Nawee Jieychien, Songkrit Assawaklang, Namphung Youngpoy
